lines.text: [Larry, as a waiter, is passing by, dinner order in hand]

[to Larry as he passes by]
Uh, pardon me. Do you have pâté de fois gras?

[Clearly confused]
I'll see if the band can play it.

[thrown out of a hotel where the rent's $1 a month]
He can't throw us out just because we're eight months behind on the rent.
But he did. I'm going back in to get my other shirt.
Get my other pair of socks too, they're standing up behind the stove.

[to the cake of soap]
You work with me, and I'll see that you're put in the tub and NOBODY uses ya. Nyuk nyuk nyuk!

[to Moe]
Don't you DARE hit me in the head, you know I'm not normal!
Wait a minute, Shylock, she'll have the money on time.
Yeah and I'll see that you get it too, me, myself, I personally, I'll guarantee it personally, see?
And who are you?
Who is he? Why he's one of the biggest steelmen in the country. He'd steal any... I mean his steel is known from coast to coast. Will E. Steel.
And how!
Is that you hat?
Yes.

[takes it off]
Why don't you get your head Simonized?
Oh how can I ever thank you?
Don't try, by the way, here's $52 I just found in my hand.
Why that's the amount I gave Mr. Scroggins!
Well ain't that a coinci-dunk?
Say, did you notice the beautiful watch Scroggins had on?
Notice it?
[pulls it out]
I got it! We can buy paint and wallpaper, I won't need this soap anymore!

[Curly slips on the soap]
Hey kid, are ya hurt?
Yeah, but I don't care!
[laughs]
